text-1: If debugging is the process of removing bugs, then programming must be the process of putting them in.
text-2: Programmers seem to be changing the world. It would be a relief, for them and for all of us, if they knew something about it.
text-3: Most good programmers do programming not because they expect to get paid or get adulation by the public, but because it is fun to program.
text-4: Programmer: A machine that turns coffee into code.
text-5: When I wrote this code, only God and I understood what I did. Now only God knows.
text-6: I’m not a great programmer; I’m just a good programmer with great habits.
text-7: You might not think that programmers are artists, but programming is an extremely creative profession.
text-8: Programming is learned by writing programs.
text-9: Software comes from heaven when you have good hardware.
text-10: There is always one more bug to fix
